[[File:Lésion bulleuse.jpg|vignette|Bulle tendue à contenu clair siégeant sur le dessus du pied ]]

question.question: What is the primary characteristic of a bullous lesion as depicted in the image?
question.option_a: A flat, red patch with no elevation
question.option_c: A dry, scaly patch with peeling skin
